attributes.action: prevent the opening of an immigration detention centre in Northern Ireland and to stop the UK Border Agency moving immigrants from NI to detention centres, such as Dungavel and Yarls Wood, in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are parents living in or around Belfast, Northern Ireland.  We oppose the opening of an immigration detention centre here.  We object to the UK Border Agency moving of immigrant families and children from NI to detention centres in Scotland and England.  Some of us are in favour of open borders.  All of us know that families and children suffer when their freedom is taken away because they are immigrants, and we call on the Government to stop the practise of immigration detention now!
